Class Drink

java.lang.Object
app.Drink
public class Drink extends Object
This class represents a menu drink item within the application. It contains descriptive information about the drink, and methods to allow the drink to interact with the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Drink(int drinkID)
    Constructs a Drink object by retrieving data from the database.

    Constructs a new Drink object with the specified details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Drink

      public Drink(String name, String description, Map<String,Float> recipe, Float price)
      Constructs a new Drink object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the drink.
      description - a breif description of the drink.
      recipe - a map of the ingridient names to the quantities used.
      price - the base price of the drink without modifications.

    • Drink

      public Drink(int drinkID)
      Constructs a Drink object by retrieving data from the database.
      Parameters:
      menuID - of item to find in database

    • getItemRecipes

      public static Map<String,Float> getItemRecipes(int itemIDToFind)
      Retrieves a recipe map for a given menu item from the database.
      Parameters:
      menuID - of an item on the menu
      Returns:
      Map of the name and quantity of each ingredient in the given menu item's recipe

    • getSizePrice

      public float getSizePrice(String drinkSize)
      Calculates the drink's price adjustment for its given size.
      Parameters:
      drinkSize - the chosen size of the drink
      Returns:
      the additional cost for that size
